meanings.definition: Not related to mental illness or treatment.
meanings.sent1: The hospital's nonpsychiatric wing focuses on physical health.
meanings.sent2: She preferred a nonpsychiatric approach to wellness.
meanings.sent3: The nonpsychiatric discussion at the conference was a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent4: His nonpsychiatric view on life was like a sunny day after a storm.
meanings.sent5: The nonpsychiatric nature of the park made it a peaceful retreat.

meanings.definition: Not involving the study or treatment of mental disorders.
meanings.sent1: The research project was strictly nonpsychiatric in nature.
meanings.sent2: The nonpsychiatric department focused on physical health.
meanings.sent3: The nonpsychiatric approach to the problem was surprisingly effective.
meanings.sent4: Her nonpsychiatric perspective on the issue was a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The nonpsychiatric environment of the gym was refreshing.
